verses.name: Song of Songs 1:1
verses.text: Osculetur me osculo oris sui ;  quia meliora sunt ubera tua vino,

verses.name: Song of Songs 1:2
verses.text: fragrantia unguentis optimis.  Oleum effusum nomen tuum ;  ideo adolescentulæ dilexerunt te.

verses.name: Song of Songs 1:3
verses.text: Trahe me, post te curremus  in odorem unguentorum tuorum.  Introduxit me rex in cellaria sua ;  exsultabimus et lætabimur in te,  memores uberum tuorum super vinum.  Recti diligunt te.

verses.name: Song of Songs 1:4
verses.text: Nigra sum, sed formosa, filiæ Jerusalem,  sicut tabernacula Cedar, sicut pelles Salomonis.

verses.name: Song of Songs 1:5
verses.text: Nolite me considerare quod fusca sim,  quia decoloravit me sol.  Filii matris meæ pugnaverunt contra me ;  posuerunt me custodem in vineis :  vineam meam non custodivi.

verses.name: Song of Songs 1:6
verses.text: Indica mihi, quem diligit anima mea, ubi pascas,  ubi cubes in meridie,  ne vagari incipiam post greges sodalium tuorum.

verses.name: Song of Songs 1:7
verses.text: Si ignoras te, o pulcherrima inter mulieres,  egredere, et abi post vestigia gregum,  et pasce hædos tuos juxta tabernacula pastorum.

verses.name: Song of Songs 1:8
verses.text: Equitatui meo in curribus Pharaonis  assimilavi te, amica mea.

verses.name: Song of Songs 1:9
verses.text: Pulchræ sunt genæ tuæ sicut turturis ;  collum tuum sicut monilia.

verses.name: Song of Songs 1:10
verses.text: Murenulas aureas faciemus tibi,  vermiculatas argento.

verses.name: Song of Songs 1:11
verses.text: Dum esset rex in accubitu suo,  nardus mea dedit odorem suum.

verses.name: Song of Songs 1:12
verses.text: Fasciculus myrrhæ dilectus meus mihi ;  inter ubera mea commorabitur.

verses.name: Song of Songs 1:13
verses.text: Botrus cypri dilectus meus mihi  in vineis Engaddi.

verses.name: Song of Songs 1:14
verses.text: Ecce tu pulchra es, amica mea ! ecce tu pulchra es !  Oculi tui columbarum.

verses.name: Song of Songs 1:15
verses.text: Ecce tu pulcher es, dilecte mi, et decorus !  Lectulus noster floridus.

verses.name: Song of Songs 1:16
verses.text: Tigna domorum nostrarum cedrina,  laquearia nostra cypressina.
